articles.title: ATP Tour: Carlos Alcaraz, Cameron Norrie both pull out of Acapulco event ahead of Indian Wells
articles.description: Top seed Carlos Alcaraz captured his seventh career ATP title last month in Argentina before losing in the Rio Open final on Sunday; Alcaraz played Cameron Norrie in both finals, who has also withdrawn from the ATP 500 event in Mexico
articles.content:
US Open champion Carlos Alcaraz has pulled out of this week's ATP 500 event in Acapulco with a strained hamstring, while British No 1 Cameron Norrie has also withdrawn.

articles.title: Argentina suspends poultry exports as first industrial case of bird flu confirmed
articles.description: Argentina has confirmed its first case of bird flu in industrial poultry, its agriculture secretary said on Tuesday, causing it to suspend avian product exports and raising fears the disease could spread and hurt exports from the South American nation.
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES, Feb 28 (Reuters) - Argentina has confirmed its first case of bird flu in industrial poultry, its agriculture secretary said on Tuesday, causing it to suspend avian product exports and raising fears the disease could spread and hurt expo... [811 chars]

articles.title: Remains of man missing for 10 days in Argentina found inside shark
articles.description: Diego Barria, a 32-year-old oil industry employee who disappeared on 18 February, was identified by a forearm tattoo.
articles.content:
TWO FISHERMEN FOUND the remains of an Argentine man who mysteriously disappeared 10 days ago inside a shark they caught, investigators have said.

articles.title: Missing man found in shark's stomach after family identifies his tattoo
